purpose_text.para: Controls access to System PMUs from EL0.

reg_groups.reg_group: A group mapping that does not have a known primary

field_description.para: System PMU <m> access. Controls access to System PMU <m>.
The registers trapped by this control are:
AArch64: SPMCNTENCLR_EL0, SPMCNTENSET_EL0, SPMCR_EL0, SPMEVCNTR<n>_EL0, SPMEVFILT2R<n>_EL0, SPMEVFILTR<n>_EL0, SPMEVTYPER<n>_EL0, SPMOVSCLR_EL0, and SPMOVSSET_EL0.

field_value_description.para: MRS read and MSR write System register accesses to System PMU <m> at EL0 are trapped to EL1, unless the instruction generates a higher priority exception.
MSR write System register accesses to System PMU <m> at EL0 are trapped to EL1, unless the instruction generates a higher priority exception.
This control does not cause any instructions to be trapped.
